text: Egh enselba amizir kam gansɨ, kamaghɨn amizir kam uan dapanim avaraghtɨ, e bar fogh suam, a Godɨn ingangarim gami.(11:10) Grighɨn akam vezɨn kamɨn deravɨra bigha mɨgeir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Pol ghaze, amiziba uan dapaniba aver puvatɨgha, egha Godɨn akam azenim garɨsi, ezɨ arazir kam mati me gumaziba ziar ekiam me ganɨdi. Kamaghɨn me uan dapaniba avɨtɨ, me bar fogh suam, amiziba Godɨn ingangarim gami.
